public ClassIntrospector<T> load(String className)
Loads a subclass of the introspected class from its name.

Parameters:
className -
Returns:
a ClassIntrospector for the loaded class
Throws:
NoSuchClassReflectionException - if the class is not found on the classpath
ClassCastReflectionException - if the loaded class is not a subclass of the introspected class

isAnnotationPresent

public boolean isAnnotationPresent(Class<? extends Annotation> annotationClass)
Determines if the instrospected type is annotated with a sepecific annotation. This method will process meta-annotations

Parameters:
annotationClass - the annotation type to search.
Returns:
true if the instrospected type has this aanotation, false otherwise

isFundamental

public boolean isFundamental()
Informs if the instrospected type is fundamental. Fundamental types are thoses primitive, respective wrappers, String and Date

Returns:
true if the instrospected type is fundamental, {@code false] otherwise.
